I want to load a DOS bootcd via grub2 or burg? Can anyone please help with configuration file entry?  
The DOS boot cd is created by this method [http://www.hiren.info/pages/bootablecd](http://www.hiren.info/pages/bootablecd "External link")  

The bootcd.iso has boot.catalog \& floppy.ima files along with added executables \[by me\] in the root. It is working fine in qemu but I am unable to call it via grub2/burg.  

Thanks   

**Edited by pokemon1, 04 May 2011 - 09:59 PM.**

forumNotes.author: Sha0
forumNotes.content:
~~The **bootcd.iso** file must be contiguous on whatever filesystem it resides within. I am assuming that its filesystem contains **floppy.ima** ? Whatever disk and partition bootcd.iso resides within, replace **(...)** below with the appropriate parameters. ``` grub> root (...) grub> map /bootcd.iso (hd32) grub> map --hook grub> root (hd32) grub> map /floppy.ima (fd0) grub> map --rehook grub> root (fd0) grub> chainloader /io.sys grub> boot ```
Disclaimer: I didn't read your linked-to article.~~ Oops. I mis-thought **GRUB4DOS** . Never mind. Sorry. ![:buehehe:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/buehehe.gif)
